title: Critical: thunderbird security update
description:
Mozilla Thunderbird is a standalone mail and newsgroup client.
This update upgrades Thunderbird to version 91.9.1.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

references.title: Update information for CVE-2022-1529 is retrieved from Red Hat
Update information for CVE-2022-1802 is retrieved from Red Hat
